title: USB C Fast Charger, 100W GaN 6 Port Type Charging Station Hub Block Cube, Wall Charger Power Strip Adapter Plug for iPad iPhone 16 15 14 13 12 Pro Max Pixel Note Galaxy, 5ft Cord A-White
description: ⚡【Fast-Speed Desktop Charging Station】Only 30 minutes, charge your phone to 60%. 6 in 1 Charging blocks with 3 x USB C PD 3.0 port (20W max), 3 x USB port(18W max), this charger supports a maximum output of 100 watt in total. No need to wait, it can charge your watch, earphone, mobile phone, fan and other 6 different devices at the same time.

top_reviews.title: Nice quality cheap brick - powers my MacBookPro 14"
top_reviews.body: Really like this brick. Have had it for over a year. It's the only power source I need to travel with. I have an M1 Pro 14" MacBookPro. And this charges it fast enough for me to not need my single port heavy apple charger when I travel.  I travel and work 3-4 days at a time with this as my only power source for laptop, batteries, phones etc and it's been great for 9 months so far Read more
